name: The Old Site
description:
Created for a university project.

You stumble upon the remains of an old, isolated facility, abandoned many years ago. You're not sure what it's for or who used to be there, but you decide to venture further in hopes of learning more. Perhaps you can find something that'll tell you what this place once was...

CONTROLS

  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse: Look
  • E: Open collectables menu
  • LSHIFT: Run
  • Right click: Look closely/Zoom
  • Ctrl: Crouch

All sounds from ZapSplat.
